description:
Course updated September 5th, 2014. Over 1,200 students!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

People always say to me “I have this drained feeling. Like everything is out of alignment and life is dragging me down…”

What if I could teach you the fundamentals of a spiritual knowledge thousands of years old? A system of balance and vitality that can make you feel better than you’ve ever felt before.

What if I can show you how to unlock the secrets of managing your spiritual energy to heal your body and mind?

Maybe you have experienced a taste of the benefits of yoga or meditation, and would like to intensify your practices by adding spiritual energy to the mix.

The ancient system of Chakras are directly responsible for your vitality, your emotions, your ability to connect with others, and everything else about your current state of being.

As an expert of spiritual and healing work for over 20 years, and author of 9 books on the topic, it is my goal to teach you about these hidden influencers of your wellbeing. To allow you to begin to leverage them to lead a more prosperous life!

Don’t underestimate the power of these forces.

Managing Chakras can have immediate benefits like:

    ·Predicting and healing mental and physical illnesses

    ·Allowing you to lose weight without dieting

    ·Combating specific diseases of the body and mind, such as depression, migraines, inflammation

    ·Improving your relationships and emotional fortitude

    ·Helping you get in touch with your inner self, your creativity, and your true meaningful calling

This course gives you a crash course Chakras, and I hope that it serves you.

See what others are saying...

"This course offers clear, concise insight into how the chakra system works...Chakras Explained will help you better understand the intangible energy system that affects both your physical and emotional health." - Christy

"The instructor is very calm, he doesn't pose himself as a guru and he presents the subjects in a simple, easy to follow way. He gave me a lot of information, links and lectures. That's what I call a great course!" - Ivan

"I loved this course. Looking forward for your upcoming courses." - Syed

Join today and let’s get started restoring balance to your life.
title: Chakras Explained: Optimize the Body's Energy and Health
